scripts.prepare: node ./yarn-project-base/scripts/update_package_jsons.mjs && yarn workspaces foreach run prepare && workspaces-to-typescript-project-references --tsconfigPath tsconfig.json && prettier -w */tsconfig.json
scripts.prepare:check: node ./yarn-project-base/scripts/update_package_jsons.mjs --check && yarn workspaces foreach run prepare:check && workspaces-to-typescript-project-references --check --tsconfigPath tsconfig.json
scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs/dist && cd docs && yarn serve
scripts.test: yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach -v run test
